channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Roots protruding Through pavement, 18th August
item.description:
Roots are protruding through the pavement on the corner of coronation square near the school causing a trip/cycle hazard
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princess Elizabeth Way, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken manhole cover, 18th August
item.description:
Number 155. The manhole cover has sunken. Two previous reports have stated it was fixed but is still an issue. This has gotten worse over the last few weeks due to buses and large vehicles driving over it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 157, Arle Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

On the pavement outside 110/112 two hedges road bishops cleeve

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Two Hedges Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked footpath, 18th August
item.description:
When approaching from the direction of the Witcombe Reservoirs on 18/08/2024, I found the waymarker at this point is obscured by overgrown vegetation. I managed to find the waymarker and climbed over the style into the field (containing horses). The landowner approached and said there was no longer a path here because it was overgrown. He directed me to where a path had once been, and it was completely impassable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Witcombe Roman Villa, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Need sign for Millbrook Court, 18th August
item.description:
Entry from Millbrook Street into Millbrook Court. A street name road sign for Millbrook Court is required as deliveries are being missed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Millbrook Street, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign isn't working correctly (part only or random activation)

item.title: Drain cover making loud clacking noise every time a car drives over it., 18th August
item.description:

item.title: Severely overflowing bin, 18th August
item.description:

As above
